name: General Checkup
description: A comprehensive assessment of overall health, including vital signs, physical examination, and basic blood tests.

name: Dental Cleaning and Checkup
description: Professional cleaning of teeth, removal of tartar, and examination for oral health issues.

name: Eye Examination
description: Comprehensive eye exam to assess vision, detect eye diseases, and prescribe corrective lenses if needed.

name: Cardiovascular Checkup
description: Evaluation of heart health, including ECG, blood pressure measurement, and cholesterol testing.

name: Diabetes Screening
description: Blood sugar test to assess the risk or presence of diabetes.

name: Respiratory Checkup
description: Evaluation of lung function and respiratory health, including spirometry.

name: Skin Cancer Screening
description: Visual examination of the skin for any signs of skin cancer.

name: Women's Health Checkup
description: Comprehensive evaluation of reproductive health, including breast exam and Pap smear.

name: Men's Health Checkup
description: Assessment of prostate health, testosterone levels, and overall well-being.
